name: Catalogue Custom Register Fields
author: Benjamin Drake

sections.description:
Before performing any thing we will check either any similar function exist in any of directory in website.
and in order to prevent it we have used WPCU prefix.

Plugin we display billing fields where below mentioned are compulsory fields
first name, Last name , address 1, city, postcode, phone number, country

where company and state are not compulsory.

Feature requests

This is list of all features that will be added at some point of time :

  • Dynamic fields addition and removal.
  • County field in Location along with dropdown selection
sections.installation:
– After getting plugin ZIP file log onto WP admin page.
– Open Plugins >> Add new.
– Click on “Upload plugin” beside top heading.
– Drag and drop plugin zip file.

short_description: Catalogue Custom Register Fields in your wordpress is to add billing fields in registration form.
